page.title: 12MR.PEACHEY, FARMER
page.content: {Mr. Peachey}has lived in this area all his life. He moved to{Donkeywell {Farm,}just outside the village of {Quenington}in l97O. It is a mixed farm with cattle, pigs and cereal crops. The land which he farms is grade three land which is not suitable for the growing of root crops. Apart from himself there are five other men working for him on the farm and each one has a specific job. The milk produced is sold to the{Milk Marketing {Board}and the pigs produced for bacon are sold to the{Co-operative Society. As an active farmer Mr.Peachey does not have a lot of spare time but when he does find the time he enjoys a game of tennis. (The farm house has a tennis court next to it). Ideally he would like a farm with better land, preferably by the sea.
